TextView.android:text: SulavSwastha is the health news portal in Nepal that commenced its services with a mobile application. At Sulav Swastha, we aim to produce in-depth health related news and articles while also earnestly developing database on doctors, hospitals, and blood donors profile among other information on health institutes across the country. Sulav Swastha maintains a distinct style of presenting issues and thus making it a first choice for people interested in health news.
